extendedInfo.description: The Brew Timer is for brewers, professional and amateur alike, who need a better way to keep track of their brew during the brew day. The application allows the brewer to create individual entries for the timing of different brewing events like the addition of hops, spices, a wort chiller, etc. These events can also include a post-boil steeping time, allowing brewers to keep track of additional lengths of time after the boil ends. These events can be grouped together as a Brew Session and can be saved to device memory in a Recipe Profile that can then be loaded when needed for future use. Each Recipe Profile contains all the events needed for a complete brew session.Brew Timer Features:- Create, save, load, and delete multiple Recipe Profiles.- Each Recipe Profile can contain events for all timed brewing processes.- The Brew Timer can sound a user selected alarm and/or vibrate when an event needs your attention.- Events can be added, edited, or removed while the the timer is running in case a modification needs to be made on the fly.- Color-coding of individual event entryâs remaining time lets you quickly determine how soon an event will trigger.- The Brew Timer can be paused and resumed at any time.The Brew Timer is also great for timing coffee roasting, baking or anything else you may need to keep track of multiple timing events.Is there something you would like to see in The Brew Timer?  I have a list of other desired features that other brewers have emailed me, send me an email and tell me what you want! (brewtimer@humanjoe.com)

reviews.title: It works!
reviews.comment: Simple app that works great. I like that I can set different custom sounds to alert me of my additions and boil timer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Last update screwed timer display
reviews.comment: Was working great until I upgraded to Jellybean. Now the timer display font is way too big for the area provided.  Only the top half of the minutes and separator appear. Can\'t see the seconds anymore.
reviews.author: Jim Sorensen

reviews.title: Makes brew day easy
reviews.comment: Great timer, easy to use. Needs export of profiles to share with fellow brewers and auto save profiles after adding new event.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: best out there
reviews.comment: but dont use it on your phone. if someone calls you, it fails to alert you during a call
reviews.author: Trnod P

reviews.title: Great timer for brewing!
reviews.comment: I just brewed using this timer and it worked great. Alarms show up in the message notification bar on my Mesmerize, so you can see exactly what alarm you are silencing. They also show in yellow and then red when close to the alarm point. I setup a boil timer w/ hop additions, mash timer, mash out, and aeration. Easy to use and worked flawlessly through my brew. You can save each alarm profile so you can just open them up next time you brew!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So far so good
reviews.comment: Works great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
reviews.comment: This timer is perfect for me. I can easily add each addition to my kettle during the boil, with custom alarms that show up in the notification bar. I was also able to set up a timer for my mash. Being able to save the profiles for future use is a huge plus, as I have about 7 recipes in my rotation that receive regular play. The Instructions are very clear, and navigation within the app is simple. I recommend this app to all homebrewers.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful for Extract Brewing but not All Grain
reviews.comment: The app interface is clean and easy to follow.  It\'s a great tool for straight extract brews but unfortunately it falls short for extract + steeped grains, partial mash, and all-grain brewing.  The reason for this is that the app only allows entering a boil time and post-boil \"steeping\" times but does not allow for mash timing, mash temperature profile changes, etc.    If this app did all grain as well as it does extract, I would give it a 5.  As-is, 3 stars.  I hope the developer continues to work on it and updates it for all grain brewing--it would be an excellent tool!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Sitting here nearly at the end of my first batch and love how much easier this has made things. Now in just have to worry about boil overs and sanitizing while I wait. With all my hops programmed when and what, I\'m left with the simple stuff. Thanks for making my first brew that much smoother.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple
reviews.comment: Perfect tool on brew day. My brew day is hectic enough, the last thing I need is a program that\'s hard to use.  It\'s simple to use, and does exactly what you need on brew day. Wonderful little app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app has been a lifesaver
reviews.comment: Easy to use and fills exactly what I need. I\'m brewing all grain ales and IPAs and this timer is perfect for reminding me to check mash temps and hop additions. I even use it to time sharing computer time for my kids :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works a advertised
reviews.comment: Just downloaded, set up a recipe and did a test run. All the alarms went off when the were supposed to, and it was easy to set up. This is great for people like me who tend to get sidetracked.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excelent timing app
reviews.comment: Limited to additions during boiling. But works well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love this app
reviews.comment: This app is a MUST HAVE for brewing. I almost forgot how o could go without it. THANK YOU!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I need for keeping track of my hop additions.  Pretty easy to use too.  I think I\'ve found my new permanent brewers assistant.
reviews.author: Chris Mills

reviews.title: Just right.
reviews.comment: This app makes brew day a little smoother.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Brilliant! Made brewing my first 5 gallons ever a breeze!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: The alarms go off on time, but the timer stops when the screen is off
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrible.
reviews.comment: No mash timer, rest etc.. no hop addition option within the boil timer. No recipe import option. Uninstalled quick
reviews.author: Chuck McLeavy

reviews.comment: App does exactly what it says it does, very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User
